main_title.description: Represents the primary heading of the slide, summarizing its main topic

sub_title.description: Represents the secondary text conveying further context about the main title

content_bullets.description: Contains key points, ideas, or highlights presented in a bulleted or listed format

main_image.description: Displays the principal visual element, such as an illustration or chart, associated with the slide content

supporting_images.description: Includes additional visual elements used to support or complement the slide content

background_information.description: Provides supplementary or contextual information for better understanding of the slide content

presenters.description: Contains the names and roles of individuals presenting or associated with the slide

acknowledgments.description: Mentions contributors or references relevant to the slide content

data.description: Highlights numerical or factual information such as statistics or research findings
